name: Introduction to Modern Analysis 2
description: A continuation of the modern analysis sequence discussing the topology of metric spaces, numerical sequences and series, continuity, differentiation, the Riemann-Stieltjes integral, sequences and series of functions, the Stone-Weierstrass theorem, functions of several variables, Stokes' theorem and the Lebesgue theory.Credit will be given for, at most, MAA 4227 or MAA 5229.
